titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Paramine Acid.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5539)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on 1, 4-diaminobenzene-2-sulfonic acid (paramine acid).
